post.text: Thank you to the great crowd of supporters in Newtown, Pennsylvania tonight! Get out & VOTE on 11/8/16. Lets MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Jeremy
comment.text: Donald J. Trump just heard that behind the scenes of the Al Smith dinner that you told Hillary she's a "Tough and talented woman."...according to the Cardinal. Is this true?

replies.author: Dillon
replies.text: Most criminals are tough and talented.

replies.author: Seth
replies.text: It's sad the worst possible fake Republican won. There might have been a chance otherwise. Instead you get someone who can't stop shooting himself in the foot and molesting women. Oh well, let's all welcome President Clinton or Madam President if you rather.

replies.author: Anna
replies.text: Anna from south africa. why is it that the democrats are so scared so scared that the president and his wife have to do her campaigning. They know something big is coming. trump is as real as it gets. its been prophesied that a leader will come to expose the wickedness. google his name. new world leader.donald is not perfect. are you.
